column4: gnome is not necessarily designed to be lean and fast, it has other priorities.  If you prefer lean and fast than pretty and featureful, try xfce (xubuntu) instead
although to my admittedly skewed taste, xfce is prettier
imho xubuntu is not as light as it used to :-/
I'd have to concur :-(  still lighter than gnome though, which my laptop wouldn't be able to run decently
